Note: Capturing pictures and videos and sending the media through WhatsApp was successful.

While the  participant was recording a video, there was an instance when they had wanted to stop recording but it didn’t respond to the gesture. I noticed while checking the phone that point the band got disconnected (on its own) via Bluetooth.
The user mentioned that meta was not responding very well occasionally especially when asking it to send media files via WhatsApp.
The PT at a point lifted up the glasses to rub their eyes.
The PT appeared tired and sleepy during at this point.
User feedback- he didn’t like that the music automatically stops once they get a notification. He would have preferred to have it still playing in the background, lowered a bit.
Glasses battery @ 15%. The PT also mention that the display got dimmer at this point.
Prior to switching , meta was not responsive to changing the music on Spotify even though the PT was listening to music.
